column2: BRIEF-Universal Health Realty Income Trust Enters Into An ATM Equity Offering Sales Agreement June 9 (Reuters) - Universal Health Realty Income Trust : * UNIVERSAL HEALTH REALTY INCOME TRUST - ON JUNE 8, ENTERED INTO AN ATM EQUITY OFFERING SALES AGREEMENT * UNIVERSAL HEALTH REALTY INCOME TRUST - MAY OFFER AND SELL BORROWED SHARES, HAVING AGGREGATE GROSS SALES PRICE NOT TO EXCEED $100 MILLION Source: (bit.ly/2YfcmbD) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Universal Health Realty Income Trust Announces Dividend Increase June 3 (Reuters) - Universal Health Realty Income Trust : * UNIVERSAL HEALTH REALTY INCOME TRUST ANNOUNCES DIVIDEND INCREASE * UNIVERSAL HEALTH - ANNOUNCED BOARD OF TRUSTEES VOTED TO INCREASE QUARTERLY DIVIDEND BY $.005 AND PAY A DIVIDEND OF $.69 PER SHARE ON JUNE 30, 2020 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Universal Health Realty Income Trust Reports 2020 First Quarter Financial Results April 27 (Reuters) - Universal Health Realty Income Trust : * SAYS COVID-19 DID NOT HAVE MATERIAL EFFECT ON OPERATIONS AND FINANCIAL RESULTS DURING Q1 OF 2020 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Universal Health Realty Income Trust Reports 2019 Q4 And Full Year Financial Results Feb 26 (Reuters) - Universal Health Realty Income Trust : * REPORTS 2019 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 FFO PER SHARE $0.78 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Universal Health Realty Income Trust Reports Q1 FFO Per Share $0.84 April 26 (Reuters) - Universal Health Realty Income Trust : * Q1 FFO PER SHARE $0.84 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
